org.knowceans.corpus

Class DisjointDocTerms

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knowceans.corpus.DisjointDocTerms

  • public class DisjointDocTerms
extends java.lang.Object
    DisjointDocTerms partitions the a given document-term matrix into P mutually exclusive document subsets and term subsets. Based on these, index sets can be retrieved into the original corpus for parallel access to mutually exclusive documents and terms.
    Author:
    gregor
